# name

Which property to request: see unistd.h. For example: _PC_CASE_SENSITIVE (is a filesystem case-sensitive?). Only one property can be requested at a time.

## Fields

- **vp**: The vnode whose filesystem to query.
- **retval**: Destination for value of property.
- **ctx**: Context to authenticate for pathconf request.

items.description: The vnode whose filesystem to query.
items.name: vp

items.description: Context to authenticate for pathconf request.
